item.title: AWS DynamoDB
item.description: DISCLAIMER: Image is generated using ChatGPT. 1. Introduction 2. DynamoDB Structure 3. Setup LocalStack 4. Using CLI 5. Using Python 6. Using Perl Introduction AWS DynamoDB is a fully managed NoSQL database service provided by AWS. It is designed for high availability, scalability and low-latency performance. It is a popular choice for modern applications that require fast and flexible data storage. Unlike traditional relational databases, DynamoDB is schemaless, meaning it does not require a fixed table structure.
